qas.question: What was the Chinese government reported running on April 4?
Who takes credit for creating the site?
Who felt that the government was involved in the website?

context: On April 4, it was reported that the Chinese government appeared to be running <a0_0>an anti-CNN website<a0_0/> that criticizes the cable network’s coverage of recent events. The site claims to have been created by <a1_0><a2_0>a Beijing citizen.<a2_0/><a1_0/> However, <a3_0>foreign correspondents<a3_0/> in Beijing voiced suspicions that Anti-cnn may be a semi-government-made website. A Chinese government spokesman insisted the site was spontaneously set up by a Chinese citizen angered over media coverage.
